message.content: {"id": "6656", "title": "Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "The close button and label for these two tool items used to stay on the same line regardless of how small the view was. This behavior is important for usability as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.", "SR": ""}

{'id': '6656', 'title': 'Bug 6656Close button moves down when view resized smaller', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'These two tool items use to stay on the same line as the label nomatter how small the view got.In my opinion, this is going to be a usuability problem.
